title: Nintendo Switch vs. PlayStation Vita - PS I Love You XOXO Ep. 58
description:
A Best Friend wants to know if the Switch is the final nail in the Vita's coffin, but Greg and Colin want to know if that happened a long time ago. (Released 10.25.16)

Vote for the worst PSN name of the year: https://goo.gl/forms/JmuWPk2iaT8fLcDs2

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafun...

Get you PS I Love You XOXO shirts and posters: http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Listen to today's artist here: https://youtu.be/HPHXnClP4fg

Submit questions for the show here: http://www.kindafunny.com/psq

Greg and Colin are back with a weekly PlayStation podcast. Catch it on YouTube and podcast services each and every Tuesday at 9 a.m. PT!

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
